thread.title: Great location but expensive
thread.title_full: Great location but expensive - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dave c
title: Great location but expensive
text: This was a very good hotel in a superb location.Rooms were good size with nice view of 42nd street.Beware of all of the added on taxes which add on approximately $42 per day ($322 on a 7 night stay).Nice polite staff ,bell boys can get you a hotel car to JFK for $65 compared to taxi price of $60 but I believe they are a much nicer vehicle.
